question: But-1-yne on reaction with dil. <katex>$H_{2}SO_{4}$</katex> in presence of <katex>$Hg^{2+}$</katex> ions at 333 K gives : [cite: 55]
explanation: Hydration of But-1-yne in the presence of <katex>$Hg^{2+}/H^+$</katex> follows Markovnikov's rule to form an enol which tautomerizes to Butan-2-one. [cite: 62]
